name: Indigo Roblox
description:
My first style! Hope you enjoy this style, which transforms most elements of ROBLOX into an Indigo/Purple colour!

If you plan to edit my style, check out https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Have fun!
additional_info:
Update Log:
1.1:Made chat bubbles indigo too! Yay!
1.2:Made a button thing indigo and polishing.


Known Glitches:

For an unknown reason, some icons are too high or too low.
Buttons are weird. Extremely weird.

If you know how to fix any of the glitches above, feel free to tell me in the feedback section.

Have fun!
